Question
========
The linear relationship between the degree of experience of pain (Y)
during an anaesthetic injection and the degree of dentition anxiety
(X<sub>1</sub>) and age (X<sub>2</sub>) in a regression formula is equal
to  Y  = 1.00 + 0.23 X<sub>1 </sub>+ 0.02 X<sub>2</sub>. A person of 20
years old is pretty anxious about the dentist. He/she has an anxiety
score of 24. What is the predicted value for the pain of this person?

Answerlist
----------
* 0.23
* 6.92
* 5.52
* 1.00

Solution
========





It is 6,92 (1,00+ 0,23\*24+0,02\*20)
